intro: Idesia fujianensis, commonly known as the Fujian Idesia, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rosaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and smooth, oval-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as mountain forests. It produces small, red fruits that contain seeds dispersed by birds. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
